mapper.select: select (select curr_date from ttrd_currdate) as 日期, i.i_name as 机构名称, tr.ord_id as 审批单号, tr_type.description as 业务种类, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, tr.setdate as 结算日期, tr.orddate as 交易日期, tr.i_code as 资产代码, tr.i_name as 资产名称, cashlb.p_class as 资产类型, TRIM(to_char(cast(ABS(tr.due_cp) as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 剩余本金, TRIM(to_char(cast(ABS(tr.due_ai) as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 应计利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 支取本金, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_ytm*100 as decimal(31,6)),'990.9999')) as 支取利率, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_aiamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 应收利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.real_ai as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 实收利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 结算金额, tr.operator as 执行人, tr.trader as 交易确认人, 'T+' || to_char(tr.setdays) 清算速度, tr.intordid as 成交单编号 FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join TTRD_INSTRUMENT right on tr.i_code = right.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_cashlb cashlb on cashlb.i_code = tr.i_code and cashlb.m_type = tr.m_type and cashlb.a_type = tr.a_type LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type where tr.ord_id = (select distinct trr.ord_id FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE trr where trr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId}) and tr.ref_sysordid is null and tr.ordstatus<0
